summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1236, for the improvement of Madison Street, in the City of Seattle, from Ninth Avenue to Terry Avenue, by paving the same with sandstone blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, etc., under Ordinance No. 13506 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
